cheatsheet.title: First time executing the DICE IDE

intro.description: In the first run of DICE, there are some properties the user can configure in the IDE in order to prepare it to work properly

item.title: Configure the IDE
item.description: To configure the IDE, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the Papyrus entry in the tree. Here you can modify parameters of the Papyrus diagrams elements
Select the Java entry in the tree. In this section, you can modify some attributes of Java, like the JDK or JRE to be used (both are valid, but not necessary if you're not going to program), etc...
Select the DICE entry in the tree. In this section, you can modify some parameters of each DICE Tool (most of them are mandatory)
